Package edu.ncsu.csc216.ticket_manager.model.command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.ticket_manager.model.command.Command
  • public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for representing a command that a user may make that may initiate a state for a ticket object. It is also used for encapsulating the information about these commands.
    Author:
    John Widdifield

    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        public Command​(Command.CommandValue cV,
               java.lang.String ownerId,
               Command.FeedbackCode fC,
               Command.ResolutionCode rC,
               Command.CancellationCode cC,
               java.lang.String note)
        Constructs a command for a transition of state.
        Parameters:
        cV - CommandValue of the command
        ownerId - The owner's Id
        fC - FeedbackCode of the command
        rC - ResolutionCode of the command
        cC - CancellationCode of the command
        note - Added notes for the command
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are two commands which cannot be executed at the same time such as having a CommandValue of FEEDBACK with a null feedbackCode.
